reviewText: Superb acting of an ill-fated pure hearted love - one could just feel the sweet bitterness of the one-sided love.  Deeply moving masterpiece although I'd wish a sweeter ending.
only movie that I did not like so far. Will never be seen again. Terrible ending.

Another juicy love triangle with two really Hot Korean men playing tug-of-war over a female they both desire... This 20 episode drama is superb! I'm enthusiastically flying through the episodes because it is so Good!! A MUST see drama!
god drama, I like it very much , good deal, thank you...
This is a simple story kind of film. I wanted to try something that was not a period film. I enjoyed it, but like the period films more.
